CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 28, 1959, pg. 19, reads: "Junior Open Champs - Bernie Stein, left, of the Pittsburgh Boys Club, and Conrad Williams, of the Lee Moore A. C., won the 135-pound and 147-pound championships in Junior Open Division of the Golden Gloves. Both fighters were favorites of the crowd. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Golden Gloves Junior Open champion boxers Bernie Stein, and Conrad Williams wearing satin robe, clasping hands and standing in boxing ring
